title: Wtb old judge john L Sullivan
author: Mdmtx

posts.post_title: Wtb old judge john L Sullivan
posts.post_content:
Hello all, I would like to find the John L Sullivan Old Judge in formal attire. Lower grade would likely be all I could afford. Let me know if you have one you would like to sell. I am also looking for the Sullivan from the history of poor boys set, but not at the eBay museum prices. Thanks for looking. 

Mark
I just consigned a low grade N174 Sullivan in formal attire (along with 3 other N174 Sullivans and numerous other Sullivan cards) to PWCC.  They should all be on Ebay next month.  Good luck!
Thanks Andy I will keep an eye out.
The John L Sullivan N174 Old Judge is available now on eBay. PWcC Auctions. Don't be shy with your bidding :). Good luck!
